DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety and dose-response relationship of DU-176b compared with placebo for the prevention of venous thromboembolism in patients after elective total knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2b Study of DU-176b, Prevention of Venous Thromboembolism in Patients After Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing unilateral total knee arthroplasty risks of hemorrhage thromboembolic risks weight less than 40 kg pregnant, suspect pregnancy, or subjects who want to become pregnant
